name: Gravity (itch) (MrWhiteRaccoon)
description:
GRAVITY

Gravity is a casual game in which you have to survive as long as you can. Use the arrow keys to move the ship, and avoid hitting the asteroids or being swallowed by the Black Hole!

This is my first time using Godot, so don't expect a perfect game, in fact, the game lacks soundtrack and I'd have liked to implement some more complex mechanics, but this is all I had time for, hope you like it

-Engine: Godot 3.1

-Graphics: Inkscape

Every asset and code was made by me for this Jam, and nothing has been reused
